name: Sea Animal Puzzle for Toddlers
description:
Hey, little explorer! Welcome to the puzzle game full of various animals! Let’s study the fascinating wildlife in a fun and educational way! Wow! So many animals!

Does your toddler likes visiting the Zoo, underwater jigsaw puzzles and enjoy playing with pets? Then you found the very right puzzle game for your little one! Here you’ll find lots of animals of all kinds and sizes! Full version of the game includes 5 fun-filled themes with 60 animals:

Ocean life free puzzles. This theme will appreciate little ones who are crazy about the sea life and marine animals. Explore the mysterious underwater world! With these baby fish sea puzzles you’ll learn various fish, a shark, an octopus, a sea horse, and a whale.

Forest. Discover various animals living in a forest: a fox, birds, owl, bunny, a bear, a dear and lots of others.

Farm. Let’s go to a farm where a piggy, a cow, horses, a lamb, ducks live!

Africa. Take an imaginary safari journey to Africa and meet its inhabitants: an elephant, a lion, a giraffe, a flamingo and more.

Pets. How many pets do you know? Find kittens, puppies, fish, hamster, parrots and turtles.

How to play matching games for toddlers: touch the screen and drag the animal pic to the correct place matching the image and its shape. When an ocean puzzle is completed enjoy the happy cheering and then tap the arrow to assemble the next one.

Features of the educational games for kids kindergarten:
- Five colorful themes with 60 silly animals;
- When a puzzle is completed children are rewarded with colorful balloon popping;
- The toddler games free ocean are highly interactive. Every free preschool ocean animals puzzle is filled with sweet animations and sounds;
- Pleasant background music and sound effects;
- Puzzles are randomly generated so every time your little one will play a different puzzle;
- Easy navigation between animals puzzles for kids specially designed for toddlers and preschool children;
- Interactive app encourages child’s development of attention, logic thinking, memory, cognitive skills, fine motor skills, etc.;
- And a pleasant bonus for parents – you don’t have to worry about losing any of the puzzle pieces!

Download the wooden block puzzle baby and forget about boredom!
